solidity.description: Solidity code of this contract; required when creating a contract. In responses, only returned with contracts initially compiled by BlockCypher.

params.description: Parameters for either contract creation or method execution.

publish.description: Named contract(s) to publish; necessary to specify when first creating a contract.

private.description: Private key associated with a funded Ethereum external account used to publish a contract or execute a method.

gas_limit.description: Maximum amount of gas to use in contract creation or method execution.

value.description: Amount (in wei) to transfer; can be used when creating a contract or calling a method.

bin.description: Hex-encoded binary compilation of this contract.

abi.description: JSON-encoded ABI. Only returned with contracts initially compiled by BlockCypher.

created.description: Timestamp when this contract was confirmed in the Ethereum blockchain.

creation_tx_hash.description: Hex-encoded transaction hash that created this contract.

results.description: If this is a response from a calling a contract method, this array of results may appear if the method returns any.
